subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Robert Cheruiyot, a four-time Boston Marathon winner, and Salina Kosgei, the 2009 Boston women’s champion, were announced as entrants for the New York City Marathon on Nov. 1.
snippet: Robert Cheruiyot, a four-time Boston Marathon winner, and Salina Kosgei, the 2009 Boston women’s champion, were announced as entrants for the New York City Marathon on Nov. 1.
